alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:48PM MDT until June 17 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 130 PM MDT. * At 1248 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenhorn Mountain, or 21 miles northeast of Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rye and Colorado City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
